#us #iaf #usa #israel #il #isr #america #mightymouse #ffar #heli #helicopter #collimator #sight #rocket #rockets #aircraft #userskin #usersight #ah1 #ah1g #ah1q

NEW TO HELICOPTER COLLIMATOR SIGHTS, PLEASE PROVIDE FEEDBACK!

Helicopter collimator sight for the AH-1G and AH-1Q models in the US and ISR trees. I do not fly choppers so I took my best guess at how they can be predictably aimed. Collective in percentage and AoA in degrees are marked for use with rockets. Sighting distance is intended for 300-600m.

TO AIM ROCKETS: Set Collective to marked value on the left, OR m...

#Kurvinox #kapitan_bomba #wtdraw
dont comment this invisible line on left, if you zoom, you wont see it. enjoy and napierdalaj w kosmitów :)
